item_adaptive_tracking_pod.name: Adaptive Tracking Pod
item_adaptive_tracking_pod.description: Equipping a SHIV with Adaptive Tracking Pods removes its aim penalty for overwatch fire.
item_adaptive_tracking_pod.tactical_text: • Confers Advanced Fire Control perk, cancelling aim penalty for SHIV reaction fire

item_advanced_suppression_module.name: Advanced Suppression Module
item_advanced_suppression_module.description: This SHIV module will allow it to suppress multiple targets at once.
item_advanced_suppression_module.tactical_text: • Confers Danger Zone perk, which allows Suppression to affect multiple enemy units

item_aegis_armor.name: Aegis Armor
item_aegis_armor.description: The Aegis Armor is an improvement of our carapace design, incorporating a prototype elerium power cell to assist the soldier in shouldering such a heavy load.

item_alien_alloy.name: Alien Alloy
item_alien_alloy.description: While extremely light, these alloys are also incredibly durable, far exceeding the strength of any substance currently available to us. As this material does not occur naturally on Earth, recovering it from the aliens is our only means of acquiring more.

item_alien_carbine.name: Alien Carbine
item_alien_carbine.description: A medium-sized plasma weapon of alien manufacture. Our soldiers cannot equip it, but it may be useful as a template for plasma weapons of our own.

item_alien_entertainment.name: Alien Entertainment
item_alien_entertainment.description: <font color='#32CD32'>This item has no research benefit, and can be sold freely or transferred to council countries.</font> We can only assume this bizarre device is some form of entertainment for the aliens. It appears to induce a euphoric state in the user.

item_alien_entertainment_damaged.name: Alien Entertainment (damaged)
item_alien_entertainment_damaged.description: <font color='#32CD32'>This item has no research benefit, and can be sold freely.</font> Although interesting, this device is too heavily damaged for us to conduct any research of value on.

item_alien_food.name: Alien Food
item_alien_food.description: <font color='#32CD32'>This item has no research benefit, and can be sold freely.</font> This...slurry...of varying genetic material has a considerable nutrient content, and could be used to provide sustenance to the aliens. Unfortunately, this mixture also contains several key markers indicating the presence of human DNA.
item_alien_food.tactical_text:
• Obtained from raids on alien bases and large UFOs
  • Has a 50% chance to be damaged in a UFO shot down with conventional weaponry
  • 20% less likely to be damaged in a UFO shot down with an EMP Cannon

item_alien_food_damaged.name: Alien Food (damaged)
item_alien_food_damaged.description: <font color='#32CD32'>This item has no research benefit, and can be sold freely.</font> The composition of the alien food supply is intriguing, but this equipment is too damaged to risk transporting it.
item_alien_food_damaged.tactical_text:
• Obtained from raids on alien bases and large UFOs
  • Has a 50% chance to be damaged in a UFO shot down with conventional weaponry
  • 20% less likely to be damaged in a UFO shot down with an EMP Cannon

item_alien_grenade.name: Alien Grenade
item_alien_grenade.description: Although similar in function to the standard HE grenade, the alien variant uses a more powerful explosive compound. Any artifacts caught in the blast radius will not be recoverable.
item_alien_grenade.tactical_text:
• The Alien Grenade does heavy damage and destroys cover
  • Destroys alien artifacts, preventing their recovery and exploitation
  • Friendly targets in the blast area are affected
  • Damage is reduced based on distance from point of detonation
  • Must be recovered by stunning aliens with the Arc Thrower
  • Not usable by XCOM until the Alien Grenades Foundry project is complete

item_alien_heavy_weapon.name: Alien Heavy Weapon
item_alien_heavy_weapon.description: A very large plasma weapon of alien manufacture. Our soldiers cannot equip it, but it may be useful as a template for plasma weapons of our own.

item_alien_pistol.name: Alien Pistol
item_alien_pistol.description: A light plasma weapon of alien manufacture. Our soldiers cannot equip it, but it may be useful as a template for plasma weapons of our own.

item_alien_rifle.name: Alien Rifle
item_alien_rifle.description: A large plasma weapon of alien manufacture. Our soldiers cannot equip it, but it may be useful as a template for plasma weapons of our own.

item_alien_stasis_tank.name: Alien Stasis Tank
item_alien_stasis_tank.description: These tanks appear to hold the alien's captives in a comatose state until they are ready for further experimentation.
item_alien_stasis_tank.tactical_text:
• Obtained from raids on alien bases and large UFOs
  • Has a 70% chance to be damaged in a UFO shot down with conventional weaponry
  • 20% less likely to be damaged in a UFO shot down with an EMP Cannon

item_alien_stasis_tank_damaged.name: Alien Stasis Tank (damaged)
item_alien_stasis_tank_damaged.description: <font color='#32CD32'>This item has no research benefit, and can be sold freely.</font> The technology used in these tanks would surely be of value to our research, but these examples are too heavily damaged for us to study.
item_alien_stasis_tank_damaged.tactical_text:
• Obtained from raids on alien bases and large UFOs
  • Has a 70% chance to be damaged in a UFO shot down with conventional weaponry
  • 20% less likely to be damaged in a UFO shot down with an EMP Cannon

item_alien_surgery.name: Alien Surgery
item_alien_surgery.description: Although rudimentary in appearance, this device must play some role in the alien's unconscionable experiments on the human captives housed here.
item_alien_surgery.tactical_text:
• Obtained from raids on alien bases and large UFOs
  • Has a 70% chance to be damaged in a UFO shot down with conventional weaponry
  • 20% less likely to be damaged in a UFO shot down with an EMP Cannon

item_alien_surgery_damaged.name: Alien Surgery (damaged)
item_alien_surgery_damaged.description: <font color='#32CD32'>This item has no research benefit, and can be sold freely.</font> Discovering the purpose of this bizarre equipment would surely be beneficial, but it's of no value to us after sustaining so much damage.
item_alien_surgery_damaged.tactical_text:
• Obtained from raids on alien bases and large UFOs
  • Has a 70% chance to be damaged in a UFO shot down with conventional weaponry
  • 20% less likely to be damaged in a UFO shot down with an EMP Cannon

item_alien_trophy.name: Alien Trophy
item_alien_trophy.description: One of the engineers has fashioned an alien trophy out of the remains of some alien hardware and hard organs. They serve as a reminder to the soldiers that the aliens are, in fact, mortal, and can be beaten.
item_alien_trophy.tactical_text:
• One of the engineers fashioned these out of the remains of some alien hardware and hard organs. They serve as a reminder that the aliens are, in fact, mortal, and can be beaten.
  • Confers Steadfast perk, preventing panic when you are wounded, when an ally is killed, wounded or panicking, or when an alien roars loudly to intimidate you

item_alloy_bipod.name: Alloy Bipod
item_alloy_bipod.description: This lightweight bipod attachment will allow more accurate fire from our snipers.
item_alloy_bipod.tactical_text:
• Heavy-duty bipod that employs alloys to create exceptional weapon balance
  • Grants +6 Aim and +6 Critical

item_alloy_cannon.name: Alloy Cannon
item_alloy_cannon.description: By developing a firing mechanism capable of projecting machined shards of the alien alloy, we've created an extremely powerful weapon that has a devastating effect on anything caught in range. However, accuracy falls off quickly over greater distances. In addition, it is not as effective against hardened targets or those in cover.
item_alloy_cannon.tactical_text:
• An advanced version of the shotgun
  • Has a high base chance to cause critical hits but limited range
  • Gauss tech weapons have a 1 in 3 chance of nullifying a point of enemy damage reduction

item_alloy_carbide_plating.name: Alloy Carbide Plating
item_alloy_carbide_plating.description: Alloy Carbide Plating confers extra survivability for our mechanized units.
item_alloy_carbide_plating.tactical_text: • Confers +4 extra HP to our mechanized units

item_alloy_jacketed_rounds.name: Alloy Jacketed Rounds
item_alloy_jacketed_rounds.description: Confers increased damage for our ballistic and gauss weaponry.
item_alloy_jacketed_rounds.tactical_text: • Confers +1 damage for all ballistic and gauss-tech primary weapons and rockets

item_alloy_plating.name: Alloy Plating
item_alloy_plating.description: Made from a dense weave of nanotube fibers, this lightweight vest provides extra damage absorption to the wearer.

item_alloy_shiv.name: Alloy SHIV
item_alloy_shiv.description: Integration of the alien alloy into the basic SHIV design results in a  weapons platform that is both lighter and stronger than the original. The reinforced chassis allows for this SHIV to be used as a mobile cover position in the field.
item_alloy_shiv.tactical_text:
• A standard SHIV with upgraded armor based on alien alloys research
  • Can provide light cover to human squadmates
  • Particularly well suited for engagements against invaders with superior firepower
  • SHIVs need extra time to load onto the Skyranger during combat; if aborting a mission, do NOT take any action with the SHIV after moving into the extraction zone

item_alloy_strike_rifle.name: Alloy Strike Rifle
item_alloy_strike_rifle.description: A medium-range gauss rifle usable by our scouts and snipers.
item_alloy_strike_rifle.tactical_text:
• Bolt-action, medium-range gauss rifle that functions in Marksman's Rifle role
  • Gauss tech weapons have a 1 in 3 chance of nullifying a point of enemy damage reduction
  • Bonus critical chance
  • Severe aim penalty when used at short range
  • Soldiers with Squadsight can target enemies and conduct reaction fire at up to five tiles beyond visual range

item_ap_grenade.name: AP Grenade
item_ap_grenade.description: A variant on the HE Grenade, this weapon does equivalent damage over a larger area, but the projectiles cannot penetrate cover. Thus, units in cover relative to the center of the blast area will be unaffected.
item_ap_grenade.tactical_text:
• The Antipersonnel grenade does more damage compared to HE grenade
  • Units in cover relative to center of blast radius will not take damage
  • Cover objects in radius will not take damage
  • Explosives may leave our researchers unable to exploit enemy artifacts
  • Damage is reduced based on distance from point of detonation

item_arc_rifle.name: Arc Rifle
item_arc_rifle.description: The Arc Rifle does low damage but can temporarily disable alien weaponry, allowing our soldiers to assist in alien captures.
item_arc_rifle.tactical_text:
• Adaptation of arc thrower technology into a rifle
  • Grants Disabling Shot perk
  • Does low damage, has a low chance of causing critical hits on normal fire, and can't stun aliens, but it will temporarily disable their neural link to their weaponry, and they will have to reload to be able to fire again
  • Suffers close-range weapon penalties like sniper rifles
  • Precision Shot perk grants unlimited range for Snipers

item_arc_thrower.name: Arc Thrower
item_arc_thrower.description: The Arc Thrower is a non-lethal sidearm designed to stun hostile targets. The mechanism seems to be most effective against weakened enemies.
item_arc_thrower.tactical_text:
• A nonlethal weapon that can stun enemies
  • The chance of a successful stun is much greater if the target has low health
  • Does not affect robotic enemies
  • Advanced versions have a better chance to stun, can heal friendly SHIVs, and take control of certain enemies

item_archangel_armor.name: Archangel Armor
item_archangel_armor.description: The Archangel suit combines our heavy armor set with a small propulsion system that allows for limited flight capabilities.
item_archangel_armor.tactical_text:
• Heavy armor
  • Toggle flight mode to initiate flying movement
  • Taking off, and each turn in flight, costs 1 fuel unit
  • The armor carries 6 fuel units; this can be expanded with additional experimental research

item_armor_piercing_ammo.name: Armor Piercing Ammo
item_armor_piercing_ammo.description: This ammo will overcome a measure of enemy damage reduction and hardening against critical hits. It may be equipped by our gunners and mechanized units.
item_armor_piercing_ammo.tactical_text:
• Reduces enemy Damage Reduction by 2
  • Does not work with sidearms or shotguns

item_assault_carbine.name: Assault Carbine
item_assault_carbine.description: A lightweight version of the assault rifle.
item_assault_carbine.tactical_text:
• Lightweight primary weapon
  • Less damage and crit chance than its assault rifle counterpart, but imparts +6 accuracy and +1 mobility

item_assault_rifle.name: Assault Rifle
item_assault_rifle.description: This ballistic rifle is standard issue for XCOM troops in the field.
item_assault_rifle.tactical_text: • The assault rifle and its variants are the primary weapons XCOM rookies can use

item_aurora_armor.name: Aurora Armor
item_aurora_armor.description: This unusual suit of armor incorporates some basic implants designed to assist the wearer in employing any psi talents they have developed.

item_autocannon.name: Autocannon
item_autocannon.description: The Autocannon is a large four-barrelled machine gun that is suitable for a SHIV platform.
item_autocannon.tactical_text: • Four-barrelled heavy machine gun suitable for mounting on a SHIV platform

item_autolaser.name: Autolaser
item_autolaser.description: The continuous Autolaser requires a supplementary power supply that makes it somewhat unwieldy in combat, but it is capable of dealing high amounts of damage.
item_autolaser.tactical_text: • Rapid-fire version of the continuous beam Laser Rifle that functions in Squad Automatic Weapon role

item_autosentry_turret.name: AutoSentry Turret
item_autosentry_turret.description: The UA571-C AutoSentry Turret Module allows the SHIV to engage multiple targets while on overwatch.
item_autosentry_turret.tactical_text: • Confers Sentinel perk, giving SHIV two reaction shots per turn

item_avalanche_missiles.name: Avalanche Missiles
item_avalanche_missiles.description: A crash program and a couple of lucky experiments led to the Avalanche Missiles, an air-to-air weapon of unprecedented precision. It represents the pinnacle of terrestrial guided-missile technology.

item_banshee_armor.name: Banshee Armor
item_banshee_armor.description: This armor incorporates a prototype elerium power cell with a single goal in mind: mobility. Coupled with a grapple, Banshee armor should provide the soldier the ability to reach almost anywhere on the battlefield.

item_base_augments.name: Base Augments
item_base_augments.description: MEC Troopers wear their cybernetic base augments when not in combat. The arms and legs lack the necessary flexibility for use in the field; hence their removal when the MEC Trooper interfaces with a MEC cybersuit. Ideally, they will permit MEC Troopers to resume normal lives should XCOM defeat the invaders.

item_battle_computer.name: Battle Computer
item_battle_computer.description: A Sectopod-derived combat computer that provides substantial enhancements for our mechanized units.

item_battle_rifle.name: Battle Rifle
item_battle_rifle.description: A heavier version of the standard ballistic assault rifle, this weapon is more powerful, but will suffer an aim penalty if not given time to set up properly.
item_battle_rifle.tactical_text:
• A heavy assault rifle variant
  • Confers +1 damage over assault rifle, but moving or taking any costly (blue) actions will reduce aim by 10 until the beginning of the next turn

item_battle_scanner.name: Battle Scanner
item_battle_scanner.description: A long-range scanner that can be thrown to provide reconnaissance without risking enemy contact. Due to the heavy energy usage this requirements, visibility can only be maintained for a short time.
item_battle_scanner.tactical_text:
• Combined motion, heat and sonic tracking device that relays target information back to user
  • Reveals cloaked units within its radius
  • Provides vision in its radius for 2 turns
  • Support grenade

item_blaster.name: Blaster
item_blaster.description: This pulse laser technology-based personal defense weapon may be carried in place of a pistol, providing additional combat power at the cost of some mobility.
item_blaster.tactical_text:
• Pulse laser-derived heavy-duty sidearm that confers -1 mobility in exchange more for more power than a pistol of comparable technological capability
  • Pulse weapons have increased critical chances
  • -8 accuracy penalty when drawn, accuracy degrades at long range

item_blaster_launcher.name: Blaster Launcher
item_blaster_launcher.description: By integrating components of the advanced alien navigation systems, we can fire self-guided rockets capable of navigating to the intended target without direct line-of-sight. Damage output has also been significantly improved through the use of an alien fusion core.
item_blaster_launcher.tactical_text:
• Upgrade to conventional rockets that permits projectiles to navigate the battlefield
  • Substantial damage improvement over the conventional rocket launcher
  • Requires a skilled user to operate correctly
  • Friendly targets in the blast area are affected
  • Blaster bombs are useful for destroying cover and forcing enemies to spread out, but may destroy artifacts our researchers need
  • Damage is reduced based on distance from point of detonation
  • Each rocket fired confers +1 mobility for the rest of the mission

item_blaster_rifle.name: Blaster Rifle
item_blaster_rifle.description: A medium-range pulse rifle usable by our scouts and snipers.
item_blaster_rifle.tactical_text:
• Medium-range pulse rifle that functions in Marksman's Rifle role
  • Very high critical chance
  • Severe aim penalty when used at short range
  • Soldiers with Squadsight can target enemies and conduct reaction fire at up to five tiles beyond visual range

item_breaching_ammo.name: Breaching Ammo
item_breaching_ammo.description: This shotgun ammo will give assault soldiers increased damage against armored targets.
item_breaching_ammo.tactical_text: • Nullifies extra damage reduction penalties for shotgun-class primary weapons (not including the sawed-off shotgun)

item_carapace_armor.name: Carapace Armor
item_carapace_armor.description: Our Carapace Armor was designed to offer substantially better protection against the alien plasma weaponry through the use of their alloys. Tests indicate a substantial survivability increase relative to conventional body armor.

item_ceramic_plating.name: Ceramic Plating
item_ceramic_plating.description: Ceramic Plating provides a measure of enhanced protection to the wearer.

item_chameleon_suit.name: Chameleon Suit
item_chameleon_suit.description: This suit will make our Scouts harder to hit on the battlefield.
item_chameleon_suit.tactical_text:
• This is a kind of enhanced camouflage we believe interferes with alien tracking, communications and targeting systems.
  • Gives Scouts bonus protection when using Lightning Reflexes and makes them immune to criticals from enemy Overwatch fire
  • Chance to be hit by first reaction fire shot reduced by 95% (instead of 90%)
  • Chance to be hit by further reaction fire shots reduced by 85% (instead of 70%)

item_chem_grenade.name: Chem Grenade
item_chem_grenade.description: Our advanced research in alien physiology has allowed us to synthesize a modified version of the acid projected by the Thin Man, and containerize it in grenade form. It should be useful against both biological and robotic targets.
item_chem_grenade.tactical_text:
• Creates a toxic cloud at impact site
  • Unprotected organic targets suffer reductions in mobility and take damage each turn; hunkering down can reduce damage
  • All targets (including robots) also suffer acid damage, reducing aim and damage reduction
  • Support grenade

item_chitin_plating.name: Chitin Plating
item_chitin_plating.description: Light plating made from the Chryssalid exoskeleton, this material provides additional protection and a significant reduction to melee damage sustained. It's also sturdy enough to provide a strangulation countermeasure.

item_chryssalid_corpse.name: Chryssalid Carcass
item_chryssalid_corpse.description: The Chryssalid carcass has a disturbing propensity to twitch despite having been dead for hours.

item_cognitive_enhancer.name: Cognitive Enhancer
item_cognitive_enhancer.description: This unique device enhances the wearer's ability to learn new skills. Unfortunately, we cannot replicate it.
item_cognitive_enhancer.tactical_text:
• Increases XP for this soldier or MEC trooper by 20 percent when equipped.
  • We are unable to reverse-engineer this item for manufacturing.

item_combat_stims.name: Combat Stims
item_combat_stims.description: This powerful stimulant cocktail derived from a chemical found in the glands of a Muton Berserker provides a temporary boost to several of our soldier's vital statistics.
item_combat_stims.tactical_text:
• Grants Adrenaline Surge perk for duration of battle
  • When its single charge is applied to soldier, it strengthens the user's Will against panic
  • Reduces incoming damage by 40% and provides immunity to critical hits if not flanked or exposed during the next 2 enemy turns
  • Increases mobility for 2 turns

item_core_armoring.name: Core Armoring
item_core_armoring.description: Confers extra hit points and immunity to critical hits when installed on one of our mechanized units.
item_core_armoring.tactical_text: • Confers Resilience perk, making mechanized unit immune to critical hits.

item_corsair_armor.name: Corsair Armor
item_corsair_armor.description: Our Corsair Armor is a fairly heavy offering that still offers significant increases in soldier mobility. It includes a grappling hook.

item_cyberdisc_corpse.name: Cyberdisc Wreck
item_cyberdisc_corpse.description: Seemingly robotic in nature, we've still detected trace amounts of organic material within this puzzling specimen.

item_damage_control_pod.name: Damage Control Pod
item_damage_control_pod.description: Confers a temporary reduction in damage taken after the SHIV is hit by enemy fire.
item_damage_control_pod.tactical_text: • Grants the Damage Control perk, reducing incoming damage for several turns after SHIV is damaged

item_defense_matrix_dodge.name: Defense Matrix (Dodge)
item_defense_matrix_dodge.description: Activate this module during interception to provide an immediate, temporary boost to our unit's evasive ability. The matrix will burn out after two uses. It will be unavailable if our fighter is in an aggressive posture.

item_drone_corpse.name: Drone Wreck
item_drone_corpse.description: A mysterious object, made up of an inelegant mess of wires and circuitry.

item_drum_mags.name: Drum Mags
item_drum_mags.description: Ammo Drums allow a significant increase in ammo capacity for our rifles.
item_drum_mags.tactical_text: • Confers +2 ammo to assault rifle, carbine and battle rifle series of weapons

item_electro_pulse.name: Electro Pulse
item_electro_pulse.description: MECs can stun organic enemies and briefly disable robotic ones with this area-of-effect electric shock device.
item_electro_pulse.tactical_text:
• MECs can injure all enemies and temporarily disable robotic ones with this area-of-effect electric shock device.
  • 3-turn cooldown

item_elerium.name: Elerium
item_elerium.description: This element is unlike anything ever discovered throughout decades of research and space exploration. As of yet, we have no means of artificially recreating this material, so we should manage our limited supply accordingly.

item_elerium_turbos.name: Elerium Turbos
item_elerium_turbos.description: Elerium Turbos allow SHIVs to move faster on the battlefield.

item_emp_cannon.name: EMP Cannon
item_emp_cannon.description: The EMP cannon was developed in an effort to increase the chance of recovering functional alien technology from downed UFOs. Although the alien systems will be disabled, the EMP does not inflict physical damage to these components.

item_enhanced_beam_optics.name: Enhanced Beam Optics
item_enhanced_beam_optics.description: Confers increased damage for our beam and pulse laser weaponry.
item_enhanced_beam_optics.tactical_text: • Confers +1 damage for all beam and pulse laser primary weapons

item_ethereal_captive.name: Ethereal Captive
item_ethereal_captive.description: While most gray market buyers cannot hold a live alien, researchers are willing to offer funding to come to our facilities to perform a vivisection.

item_ethereal_corpse.name: Ethereal Corpse
item_ethereal_corpse.description: A frail, surprisingly delicate creature...its strength must lie beyond its physical form.

item_ethereal_device.name: Ethereal Device
item_ethereal_device.description: Some members of the staff seem leery of working in close proximity to this "Ethereal Device," going so far as to claim illness and fatigue in its presence.
item_ethereal_device.tactical_text:
• The Ethereal Device is recovered from an Overseer UFO.
  • It is required to complete the story.

item_exalt_intelligence.name: EXALT Intelligence
item_exalt_intelligence.description: This intelligence will help us narrow down the location of EXALT's base.

item_firestorm.name: Firestorm
item_firestorm.description: The Firestorm is our highly advanced combat aircraft incorporating numerous advances gained from studying the technology found in the alien ships. Power and navigational systems in particular were adapted directly from the alien designs. Once it is built, our most experienced combat aviator will take over as the pilot of the new craft.
item_firestorm.tactical_text: • Each Firestorm costs 50 per month to maintain

item_flak_ammo.name: Flak Ammo
item_flak_ammo.description: Confers bonus damage against airborne enemies and allows MECs to use Collateral Damage ability against them.
item_flak_ammo.tactical_text:
• Confers greater of +2 or 20% bonus base weapon damage against flying units that are aloft when using primary gun or rockets
  • On MECs, also allows Collateral Damage ability to target airborne enemies and does bonus damage with all collateral damage attacks
  • Damage bonus is conferred after any damage reduction is applied

item_flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
item_flamethrower.description: Allows the MEC to lay waste to a cone-shaped area. Flame can spill outside the aiming area.
item_flamethrower.tactical_text:
• Allows the MEC to lay waste to a cone-shaped area. Flame can spill outside the aiming area.
  • Effect area is a 60-degree cone extending 8 tiles from the MEC
  • Limited uses per mission; can be equipped multiple times per soldier

item_flashbang_grenade.name: Flashbang Grenade
item_flashbang_grenade.description: This grenade-style weapon emits a disorienting flash of light with accompanying sounds. Any enemies that can see the blast will be disoriented, suffering severe penalties to Aim and movement. Robotic and psionic enemies are immune.
item_flashbang_grenade.tactical_text:
• Enemy units inside the blast radius suffer significant Aim and movement penalties during their next turn.
  • Robotic and advanced psionic enemies are immune.
  • Support Grenade

item_floater_captive.name: Floater Captive
item_floater_captive.description: While most gray market buyers cannot hold a live alien, researchers are willing to offer funding to come to our facilities to perform a vivisection.

item_floater_corpse.name: Floater Corpse
item_floater_corpse.description: Floater cadavers appear to be equal parts machine and organic matter, forming a tangled mess of genetic manipulation.

item_fuel_cell.name: Fuel Cell
item_fuel_cell.description: Equipping this allows our flight armors to stay aloft longer.
item_fuel_cell.tactical_text: • Confers additional flight fuel for Archangel and Seraph armors and Hover SHIVs

item_fusion_core.name: Fusion Core
item_fusion_core.description: This equipment is part of the fusion core recovered from the largest class of the alien UFOs. We may be able to harness its capabilities for use in an advanced weapon prototype.
item_fusion_core.tactical_text:
• Obtained from very large UFOs
  • Will explode if damaged

item_fusion_lance.name: Fusion Lance
item_fusion_lance.description: The Fusion Lance is the most powerful anti-aircraft weapon available to XCOM. It should be capable of taking down any UFO.
item_fusion_lance.tactical_text:
• XCOM's most devastating anti-UFO weapon
  • Can only be mounted on the Firestorm

item_gatling_laser.name: Gatling Laser
item_gatling_laser.description: An extended-range Gunner weapon that is heavier than the Autolaser, this weapon does greater damage but is difficult to relocate in a combat situation.
item_gatling_laser.tactical_text:
• The largest man-portable beam laser we can construct, this functions in an LMG role
  • Confers increased damage relative to our laser SAWs at a -2 mobility penalty
  • Operator cannot take costly actions and fire in the same turn
  • Grants Squadsight and may fire five tiles beyond normal visual range

item_gatling_pulser.name: Gatling Pulser
item_gatling_pulser.description: An extended-range Gunner weapon that is heavier than the Pulse Autolaser, this weapon does greater damage but is difficult to relocate in a combat situation.
item_gatling_pulser.tactical_text:
• The largest man-portable pulse laser we can construct, this functions in an LMG role
  • Confers increased damage relative to our pulse SAWs at a -2 mobility penalty
  • Operator cannot take costly actions and fire in the same turn
  • Grants Squadsight and may fire five tiles beyond normal visual range

item_gauss_autopistol.name: Gauss Autopistol
item_gauss_autopistol.description: This gauss technology-based personal defense weapon may be carried in place of a pistol, providing additional combat power at the cost of some mobility.
item_gauss_autopistol.tactical_text:
• Heavy-duty sidearm that confers -1 mobility in exchange more for more power than a pistol of comparable technological capability
  • Gauss tech weapons have a 1 in 3 chance of nullifying a point of enemy damage reduction
  • -8 accuracy penalty when drawn, accuracy degrades at long range

item_gauss_autorifle.name: Gauss Autorifle
item_gauss_autorifle.description: This fully automatic heavy Gauss Rifle should fulfill the Squad Automatic Weapon role in our fireteams.
item_gauss_autorifle.tactical_text:
• Rapid-fire version of Gauss Rifle that functions in Squad Automatic Weapon role
  • Gauss tech weapons have a 1 in 3 chance of nullifying a point of enemy damage reduction

item_gauss_carbine.name: Gauss Carbine
item_gauss_carbine.description: A lightweight version of the gauss rifle.
item_gauss_carbine.tactical_text:
• Lightweight primary weapon
  • Less damage and crit chance than its gauss rifle counterpart, but imparts +6 accuracy and +1 mobility
  • Gauss tech weapons have a 1 in 3 chance of nullifying a point of enemy damage reduction

item_gauss_long_rifle.name: Gauss Long Rifle
item_gauss_long_rifle.description: This large-caliber anti-materiel rifle is capable of inflicting massive damage to enemy aliens and machines, but it is slow to reload.
item_gauss_long_rifle.tactical_text:
• Anti-materiel rifle based on Gauss technologies
  • Large-caliber slugs offer anti-materiel capabilites (grants HEAT Ammo perk and halves enemy hardened bonus against critical hits), but require manual loading after every shot without upgrades
  • Gauss tech weapons have a 1 in 3 chance of nullifying a point of enemy damage reduction
  • Unlike other weapons, Sniper Rifles are less accurate the closer the shooter gets to the target
  • Snipers cannot take costly actions (such as moving) and fire in the same turn without advanced training

item_gauss_machine_gun.name: Gauss Machine Gun
item_gauss_machine_gun.description: An extended-range Gunner weapon that is heavier than the Autorifle, this weapon does greater damage but is difficult to relocate in a combat situation.
item_gauss_machine_gun.tactical_text:
• The largest man-portable gauss gun we can construct, this functions in an LMG role
  • Confers increased damage relative to our gauss SAWs at a -2 mobility penalty relative to our SAWs
  • Gauss tech weapons have a 1 in 3 chance of nullifying a point of enemy damage reduction
  • Operator cannot take costly actions and fire in the same turn
  • Grants Squadsight and may fire five tiles beyond normal visual range

item_gauss_rifle.name: Gauss Rifle
item_gauss_rifle.description: The Gauss Rifle may be the deadliest personal weapon developed to date. It uses a multistage coilgun to propel rounds at massive velocities.
item_gauss_rifle.tactical_text:
• Significantly greater muzzle velocity and penetration than basic assault rifle
  • Gauss tech weapons have a 1 in 3 chance of nullifying a point of enemy damage reduction

item_gauss_stuttergun.name: Gauss Stuttergun
item_gauss_stuttergun.description: A gauss version of the submachine gun.
item_gauss_stuttergun.tactical_text:
• Lightweight primary weapon
  • Confers +3 mobility, at a cost of damage and critical hit chances relative to rifles
  • Gauss tech weapons have a 1 in 3 chance of nullifying a point of enemy damage reduction

item_grenade_launcher.name: Grenade Launcher
item_grenade_launcher.description: MECs can make up for their lack of thrown grenade capability with a long-range grenade launcher.

item_he_grenade.name: HE Grenade
item_he_grenade.description: A standard issue High Explosive Grenade, specialized for destroying cover in a small radius.
item_he_grenade.tactical_text:
• The High Explosive Grenade damages enemies and their cover in blast radius
  • Destroys alien artifacts, preventing their recovery and exploitation
  • Friendly targets in the blast area are affected
  • Damage is reduced based on distance from point of detonation

item_heat_ammo.name: HEAT Ammo
item_heat_ammo.description: Equipping our SHIV with High Explosive Anti-Tank (HEAT) ammo will allow it to do significant damage to enemy robotic units.
item_heat_ammo.tactical_text: • Confers HEAT Ammo perk, allowing SHIV to do additional damage to robotic enemies

item_heater.name: Heater
item_heater.description: This beam laser personal defense weapon may be carried in place of a pistol, providing additional combat power at the cost of some mobility.
item_heater.tactical_text:
• Beam laser-derived heavy-duty sidearm that confers -1 mobility in exchange for more power than a pistol of comparable technological capability
  • -2 accuracy penalty when drawn; accuracy degrades at long range

item_heavy_floater_captive.name: Heavy Floater Captive
item_heavy_floater_captive.description: While most gray market buyers cannot hold a live alien, researchers are willing to offer funding to come to our facilities to perform a vivisection.

item_heavy_floater_corpse.name: Heavy Floater Corpse
item_heavy_floater_corpse.description: An enormous, floating mass of twisted engineering, this Floater variant has even less organic tissue than the previous Floater specimen.

item_heavy_gauss_rifle.name: Heavy Gauss Rifle
item_heavy_gauss_rifle.description: A more powerful gauss rifle that suffers an aim penalty if a soldier is moving.
item_heavy_gauss_rifle.tactical_text:
• A heavy gauss rifle variant
  • Confers +1 damage over gauss rifle, but moving or taking any costly (blue) actions will reduce aim by 10 until the beginning of the next turn
  • Gauss tech weapons have a 1 in 3 chance of nullifying a point of enemy damage reduction

item_heavy_laser_rifle.name: Heavy Laser Rifle
item_heavy_laser_rifle.description: A more powerful laser rifle that is most accurate when a soldier has time to take aim.
item_heavy_laser_rifle.tactical_text:
• A heavy laser rifle variant
  • Confers +1 damage over laser rifle, but moving or taking any costly (blue) actions will reduce aim by 10 until the beginning of the next turn

item_heavy_plasma_rifle.name: Heavy Plasma Rifle
item_heavy_plasma_rifle.description: A more powerful plasma rifle that requires a skilled soldier to operate effectively
item_heavy_plasma_rifle.tactical_text:
• A heavy plasma rifle variant
  • Confers +1 damage over plasma rifle, but moving or taking any costly (blue) actions will reduce aim by 10 until the beginning of the next turn
  • +1 damage when steadied

item_heavy_pulse_rifle.name: Heavy Pulse Rifle
item_heavy_pulse_rifle.description: A more powerful pulse rifle that works best when the soldier has good positioning.
item_heavy_pulse_rifle.tactical_text:
• A heavy pulse rifle variant
  • Confers +1 damage over pulse rifle, but moving or taking any costly (blue) actions will reduce aim by 10 until the beginning of the next turn

item_hi_cap_mags.name: Hi Cap Mags
item_hi_cap_mags.description: High-capacity magazines allow the soldier to fire an additional round or burst over standard magazines before a reload is required.
item_hi_cap_mags.tactical_text:
• Provides unit with one additional burst or shot with their primary weapon before a reload is required
  • Ammo bonus stacks with bonus provided by soldier's Lock N' Load perk

item_holo_targeter.name: Holo-Targeter
item_holo_targeter.description: The Holo-Targeter will allow mechanized units transmit target data to the rest of the squad, providing a temporary boost for all attacks against the targeted unit.

item_hover_shiv.name: Hover SHIV
item_hover_shiv.description: Our latest modification to the SHIV vehicle involves the integration of a small pulse engine, allowing the entire platform to fly over rough terrain.
item_hover_shiv.tactical_text:
• A SHIV designed around alien navigation and propulsion technology
  • Capable of limited flight in combat situations
  • Superb for high-risk recon
  • SHIVs need extra time to load onto the Skyranger during combat; if aborting a mission, do NOT take any action with the SHIV after moving into the extraction zone

item_hyperwave_beacon.name: Hyperwave Beacon
item_hyperwave_beacon.description: This beacon was carefully guarded within the alien base, implying its importance to their invasion. We must work to uncover its purpose...
item_hyperwave_beacon.tactical_text: • Recovered during an alien base assault, which requires a Skeleton Key

item_illuminator_gunsight.name: Illuminator Gunsight
item_illuminator_gunsight.description: This finely crafted targeting aid taken from the body of EXALT's commander detects elerium and meld exposed to our atmosphere, giving our soldiers greater accuracy against injured enemy targets. Unfortunately, we cannot replicate it.
item_illuminator_gunsight.tactical_text:
• Confers Executioner perk, granting additional +10 aim and +10 critical chance against enemies at 50% health or less
  • We are unable to reverse-engineer this item for manufacturing.

item_impact_vest.name: Impact Vest
item_impact_vest.description: This vest hardens against heavy impacts, reducing damage suffered by the assault at close range.
item_impact_vest.tactical_text: • Confers Shock-Absorbent Armor perk, providing 33% Damage Reduction against attacks made from within four tiles

item_incinerator_module.name: Incinerator Module
item_incinerator_module.description: The Incinerator Module uses alien materials to hold elerium in an excited state, increasing flame temperator and conferring bonus damage for MEC flamethrowers.

item_interceptor.name: Interceptor
item_interceptor.description: XCOM's first line of defense against the alien threat. Interceptors can be scrambled one at a time to respond to UFOs.
item_interceptor.tactical_text: • Each Interceptor costs 40 per month to maintain

item_kestrel_armor.name: Kestrel Armor
item_kestrel_armor.description: The Kestrel suit combines lightweight body armor with an integrated grappling hook for scaling objects in the field.

item_kinetic_strike_module.name: Kinetic Strike Module
item_kinetic_strike_module.description: A powerful arm upgrade for the MEC, allowing the wielder to pulverize adjacent cover and enemies.
item_kinetic_strike_module.tactical_text:
• A powerful arm upgrade for the MEC, allowing the wielder to pulverize adjacent cover and enemies
  • Equipping multiple KSMs confers +3 base damage for each strike

item_laser_cannon.name: Laser Cannon
item_laser_cannon.description: These super-cooled laser cannons should increase our ability to shoot down alien craft.

item_laser_carbine.name: Laser Carbine
item_laser_carbine.description: A lightweight version of the laser rifle.
item_laser_carbine.tactical_text:
• Lightweight primary weapon
  • Less damage and crit chance relative to its laser rifle counterpart, but imparts +12 accuracy and +1 mobility

item_laser_lance.name: Laser Lance
item_laser_lance.description: An accurate MEC laser weapon conferring additional aim.

item_laser_pistol.name: Laser Pistol
item_laser_pistol.description: The laser pistol relies on our latest advancements to provide a more powerful sidearm.
item_laser_pistol.tactical_text:
• Small handheld laser that serves as improvement over the conventional pistol
  • Beam laser; confers +6 accuracy bonus, but accuracy degrades at long range

item_laser_rifle.name: Laser Rifle
item_laser_rifle.description: The continuous Laser Rifle relies on advances in optics technology derived from alien materials to offer an incredibly accurate weapon.
item_laser_rifle.tactical_text: • The continuous beam Laser Rifle burns deep cavities in targets

item_laser_shatterray.name: Laser Shatterray
item_laser_shatterray.description: A very lightweight laser weapon that trades combat power for soldier mobility.
item_laser_shatterray.tactical_text:
• Lightweight primary weapon
  • Confers +3 mobility, at a cost of damage and critical hit chances relative to rifles

item_laser_sight.name: Laser Sight
item_laser_sight.description: The Laser Sight provides a marginal improvement in the accuracy of the soldier's main weapon.

item_laser_sniper_rifle.name: Laser Sniper Rifle
item_laser_sniper_rifle.description: The Laser Sniper Rifle provides a greater chance of inflicting critical damage to enemy targets. However, due to the unwieldy nature of this rifle, our soldiers will suffer a penalty when attempting to strike targets at close range.
item_laser_sniper_rifle.tactical_text:
• A long rifle version of the Laser Rifle that causes increased damage and has a high chance of critical hits
  • Unlike other weapons, Sniper Rifles are less accurate the closer the shooter gets to the target
  • Snipers cannot take costly actions (like moving) and fire in the same turn without advanced training

item_laser_strike_rifle.name: Laser Strike Rifle
item_laser_strike_rifle.description: A medium-range laser rifle usable by our scouts and snipers.
item_laser_strike_rifle.tactical_text:
• Medium-range beam laser rifle that functions in Marksman's Rifle role
  • Bonus critical chance
  • Severe aim penalty when used at short range
  • Soldiers with Squadsight can target enemies and conduct reaction fire at up to five tiles beyond visual range

item_leather_jacket.name: Leather Jacket
item_leather_jacket.description: Covert operatives must blend into a crowd, and this lightly armored suit serves that purpose well.
item_leather_jacket.tactical_text:
• Very light armor, but allows a unit to blend into everyday society
  • Only usable by Covert Operatives on EXALT missions
  • Sharp-looking, +1 charisma

item_lmg.name: LMG
item_lmg.description: The ballistic Light Machine Gun is the largest man-portable gun available to XCOM. Its size confers a great deal of firepower, but also makes it impossible to relocate and fire in the same turn. Careful planning is required to make the most of this weapon.
item_lmg.tactical_text:
• The largest man-portable gun in our inventory
  • Confers increased damage relative to our SAWs at a -2 mobility penalty
  • Operator cannot take costly actions and fire in the same turn
  • Grants Squadsight and may fire five tiles beyond normal visual range

item_machine_pistol.name: Machine Pistol
item_machine_pistol.description: A rapid-fire ballistic sidearm that offers more firepower than a conventional pistol. Its increased weight slows soldiers down slightly and makes the weapon somewhat unwieldy.
item_machine_pistol.tactical_text:
• Sidearm that is more powerful than a pistol but confers -1 mobility
  • -8 accuracy penalty when drawn, accuracy degrades at long range

item_marksman_rifle.name: Marksman's Rifle
item_marksman_rifle.description: The Marksman's Rifle is a medium-to-long range rifle, ideal for hit-and-run tactics or sniper operations where the soldier may need to relocate quickly.
item_marksman_rifle.tactical_text:
• Bolt-action, medium-range rifle
  • Severe aim penalty when used at short range
  • Soldiers with Squadsight can target enemies and conduct reaction fire at up to five tiles beyond visual range

item_marksman_scope.name: Marksman's Scope
item_marksman_scope.description: This specialized scope will give our Scouts the ability to hit targets beyond visual range with Marksman's and Strike Rifles.
item_marksman_scope.tactical_text: • Confers Squadsight Perk, granting extended range to Marksman's and Strike Rifles

item_mec_1.name: MEC-1 Paladin
item_mec_1.description: Our first Mechanized Exoskeletal Cybersuit, or MEC, has access to heavier primary weapons than unaugmented soldiers can use.
item_mec_1.tactical_text:
• MECs cannot use cover and their size means reaction fire against them is more accurate
  • All MECs receive the One For All perk, providing bonus Damage Reduction and cover for allies when activated
  • All MECs receive the Combined Arms perk, nullifying one point of enemy Damage Reduction

item_mec_2.name: MEC-2 Defender
item_mec_2.description: The MEC-2 Defender is an improved MEC-1 with an emphasis on survivability. It is equipped with a Body Shield generator.
item_mec_2.tactical_text:
• MECs cannot use cover and their size means reaction fire against them is more accurate
  • All MECs receive the One For All perk, providing bonus Damage Reduction and cover for allies when activated
  • All MECs receive the Combined Arms perk, nullifying one point of enemy Damage Reduction

item_mec_3.name: MEC-3 Valiant
item_mec_3.description: The MEC-3 Valiant is an improved variant of the MEC-1 that is specialized toward mobility and tactical flexibility. It is equipped with Jet Boot Modules.
item_mec_3.tactical_text:
• MECs cannot use cover and their size means reaction fire against them is more accurate
  • All MECs receive the One For All perk, providing bonus Damage Reduction and cover for allies when activated
  • All MECs receive the Combined Arms perk, nullifying one point of enemy Damage Reduction

item_mec_4.name: MEC-4 Dauntless
item_mec_4.description: The MEC-4 Dauntless is a heavy but balanced MEC design that somewhat favors survivability over mobility. It is equipped with a Body Shield generator.
item_mec_4.tactical_text:
• MECs cannot use cover and their size means reaction fire against them is more accurate
  • All MECs receive the One For All perk, providing bonus Damage Reduction and cover for allies when activated
  • All MECs receive the Combined Arms perk, nullifying one point of enemy Damage Reduction

item_mec_5.name: MEC-5 Devastator
item_mec_5.description: The MEC-5 Devastator is the best-protected combat exoskeleton we can devise, but its mobility has suffered. It is equipped with a Body Shield generator.
item_mec_5.tactical_text:
• MECs cannot use cover and their size means reaction fire against them is more accurate
  • All MECs receive the One For All perk, providing bonus Damage Reduction and cover for allies when activated
  • All MECs receive the Combined Arms perk, nullifying one point of enemy Damage Reduction

item_mec_6.name: MEC-6 Vanguard
item_mec_6.description: The MEC-6 Vanguard prioritizes mobility to the extreme, but it cannot survive as many hits as our other designs. It is equipped with Jet Boot Modules.
item_mec_6.tactical_text:
• MECs cannot use cover and their size means reaction fire against them is more accurate
  • All MECs receive the One For All perk, providing bonus Damage Reduction and cover for allies when activated
  • All MECs receive the Combined Arms perk, nullifying one point of enemy Damage Reduction

item_mec_7.name: MEC-7 Vindicator
item_mec_7.description: The MEC-7 Vindicator is a balanced design with a moderate emphasis on mobility over the ability to sustain damage. It is equipped with Jet Boot Modules.
item_mec_7.tactical_text:
• MECs cannot use cover and their size means reaction fire against them is more accurate
  • All MECs receive the One For All perk, providing bonus Damage Reduction and cover for allies when activated
  • All MECs receive the Combined Arms perk, nullifying one point of enemy Damage Reduction

item_mechtoid_corpse.name: Mechtoid Core
item_mechtoid_corpse.description: The Mechtoid's cybernetic core is a highly efficient and well-engineered control module for the battlesuit as a whole.

item_medikit.name: Medikit
item_medikit.description: Our field-deployable Medikit can temporarily treat a soldier's wounds through the use of nanosutures and high-potency stimulants.
item_medikit.tactical_text:
• Restores 3 health to an ally, but can be upgraded for greater effectiveness
  • Can save a critically wounded ally from bleeding out
  • Can be used to neutralize acid in an ally

item_meld.name: Meld
item_meld.description: The nanites contained in this advanced alien material can be directed to fuse organic and physical structures in various ways, allowing powerful genetic and cybernetic modifications.

item_mimic_beacon.name: Mimic Beacon
item_mimic_beacon.description: This device has been programmed to mimic the auditory cues the invaders appear to use in the field. It can be used to attract their attention to an area.
item_mimic_beacon.tactical_text:
• Thrown like a grenade
  • Emits sounds and psionic cues that interfere with alien tactical comms
  • Causes aliens within radius to approach the beacon for 2 turns
  • Only psis can equip; higher will soldiers have greater chance to succeed; high-will aliens have a greater chance to resist
  • Draws some will when equipped
  • Support grenade

item_mind_shield.name: Mind Shield
item_mind_shield.description: Developed using the cybernetic implants we removed from the skull of psionic alien species, this device should allow for a greater resistance to offensive psi attacks. It also projects a low-level psi field that will deter strangulation attempts.
item_mind_shield.tactical_text:
• Strengthens the user's Will against enemy psionic attacks
  • Confers Steadfast perk, preventing panic when wounded, when an ally is killed, wounded or panicking, and when an alien attempts the intimidation ability

item_minigun.name: Minigun
item_minigun.description: Ordinarily a weapon of this size would have to be mounted on hardware too large to feasibly respond to alien strikes. With the development of MEC technology, we've been able to combine its firepower with the mobility and versatility of infantry.
item_minigun.tactical_text: • Risk of catastrophic overheating precludes suppression with this weapon

item_motion_tracker.name: Motion Tracker
item_motion_tracker.description: The motion tracker uses radar pulses and infrared sensors to detect nearby enemies, civilians and alien artifacts.
item_motion_tracker.tactical_text:
• Scans 360 degree area around soldier to a range of 35 meters (roughly 5 tiles beyond visual range)
  • Allies are colored blue; aliens and meld-enhanced enemy humans red; human civilians white; bomb and active plasma bomb power nodes green; meld canisters yellow
  • Covert operatives will see hackable radar arrays as green markers
  • 3 Charges, 4 with Packmaster
  • Limited to one per soldier

item_muton_captive.name: Muton Captive
item_muton_captive.description: While most gray market buyers cannot hold a live alien, researchers are willing to offer funding to come to our facilities to perform a vivisection.

item_muton_corpse.name: Muton Corpse
item_muton_corpse.description: The Muton corpses remain surprisingly warm to the touch even hours after their expiration.

item_muton_berserker_captive.name: Muton Berserker Captive
item_muton_berserker_captive.description: While most gray market buyers cannot hold a live alien, researchers are willing to offer funding to come to our facilities to perform a vivisection.

item_muton_berserker_corpse.name: Muton Berserker Corpse
item_muton_berserker_corpse.description: The Berserker corpse continues to radiate an astonishing amount of heat despite hours in storage.

item_muton_elite_captive.name: Muton Elite Captive
item_muton_elite_captive.description: While most gray market buyers cannot hold a live alien, researchers are willing to offer funding to come to our facilities to perform a vivisection.

item_muton_elite_corpse.name: Muton Elite Corpse
item_muton_elite_corpse.description: Despite their ornate armor, underneath, these Mutons are unremarkable in their distinction from one another...almost...featureless.

item_neural_gunlink.name: Neural Gunlink
item_neural_gunlink.description: Weapon module that channels a significant portion of a psionic soldier's mental capability into precognition, allowing more accurate targeting of enemies.

item_neuroregulator.name: Neuroregulator
item_neuroregulator.description: We believe this device was given to EXALT by the aliens in an attempt to develop psionic powers in EXALT's commander, but they must not have been very successful. While we can employ it on our own troopers, we cannot replicate it.
item_neuroregulator.tactical_text:
• Increases Psi XP for this soldier by 50 percent when equipped.
  • We are unable to reverse-engineer this item for manufacturing.

item_outsider_shard.name: Outsider Shard
item_outsider_shard.description: This shard is all that remains of the disabled Outsider. It seems to hum with energy.
item_outsider_shard.tactical_text: • Obtained by stunning an Outsider with an Arc Thrower, in lieu of a captive

item_particle_cannon.name: Particle Cannon
item_particle_cannon.description: Applications of our heavy plasma technology permit the creation of a burst-style particle beam, capable of unprecedented focused energy output. Its heat dispersal would be highly dangerous to an unmodified soldier, but a MEC suit is capable of mounting the necessary systems.
item_particle_cannon.tactical_text:
• Devastating plasma-based MEC weapon
  • Risk of catastrophic overheating precludes suppression with this weapon
  • Has EMP-like effects, conferring +1 damage against robotic targets

item_phalanx_armor.name: Phalanx Armor
item_phalanx_armor.description: The Phalanx Armor is our first attempt to use alien materials in a complete armor suit.

item_phoenix_cannon.name: Phoenix Cannon
item_phoenix_cannon.description: The Phoenix Cannon is capable of delivering massive burst damage with armor-piercing alloy-based rounds.

item_phoenix_coilgun.name: Phoenix Coilgun
item_phoenix_coilgun.description: The Phoenix Coilgun improves on its predecessor with even more destructive capability and armor penetration.
item_phoenix_coilgun.tactical_text: • All Phoenix Cannons are automatically upgraded to Phoenix Coilguns upon completion of the required foundry project

item_pistol.name: Pistol
item_pistol.description: A weapon of last resort, the simple ballistic pistol is a close-range gun that doesn't pack much of a punch. Still, carrying this sidearm may save the life of a soldier whose primary weapon is out of ammo.
item_pistol.tactical_text:
• A sidearm with limited tactical value
  • Useful for when a soldier's main weapon is out of ammo, or otherwise unusable
  • Accuracy degrades at long range

item_plasma_cannon.name: Plasma Cannon
item_plasma_cannon.description: The focused plasma cannon is an ideal anti-UFO weapon, combining high damage output with a long effective range.

item_plasma_carbine.name: Plasma Carbine
item_plasma_carbine.description: This lightweight rifle functions on the same principle as our other plasma weapon concepts - a jet of ionized gas discharged through a focused magnetic field. The lightweight frame greatly improves the overall accuracy of this weapon.
item_plasma_carbine.tactical_text:
• A light, accurate variant of the Plasma Rifle
  • Carries a +6 Aim bonus and +1 mobility bonus, but has lower damage and crit chance relative to Plasma Rifle
  • Confers +6 defense, as lightweight and balanced design makes it easy for soldier to move in combat

item_plasma_dragon.name: Plasma Dragon
item_plasma_dragon.description: An extended-range Gunner weapon that is heavier than the Plasma Novagun, this weapon does greater damage but is difficult to relocate in a combat situation.
item_plasma_dragon.tactical_text:
• The largest man-portable plasma weapon we can construct, this functions in an LMG role
  • Confers increased damage relative to our plasma SAWs at a -2 mobility penalty
  • Operator cannot take costly actions and fire in the same turn
  • Grants Squadsight and may fire five tiles beyond normal visual range
  • Does massive damage to the combat environment
  • Airbursting plasma charges confer +1 damage against airborne targets

item_plasma_mauler.name: Plasma Mauler
item_plasma_mauler.description: This heavy plasma technology-based personal defense weapon may be carried in place of a pistol, providing additional combat power at a significant mobility cost.
item_plasma_mauler.tactical_text:
• Plasma-derived heavy-duty sidearm that confers -1 mobility in exchange for more power than the plasma pistol
  • -8 accuracy penalty when drawn, accuracy degrades at long range

item_plasma_novagun.name: Plasma Novagun
item_plasma_novagun.description: The Plasma Novagun uses an expanded power supply and cooling mechanism to allow for a much higher rate of fire than anything we've fielded previously.
item_plasma_novagun.tactical_text:
• Powerful plasma-based personal weapon that functions in Squad Automatic Weapon role
  • Does significant damage to the combat environment
  • Unlike other SAW-series weapons, the Novagun can be steadied for greater accuracy

item_plasma_pistol.name: Plasma Pistol
item_plasma_pistol.description: By discharging a lethal shot of ionized gas in an artificially generated magnetic field, this weapon performs far beyond the capabilities of any projectile based sidearm.
item_plasma_pistol.tactical_text:
• The most powerful pistol available to XCOM
  • Accuracy degrades at long range

item_plasma_rifle.name: Plasma Rifle
item_plasma_rifle.description: This modified assault rifle fires a jet of ionized gas through a focused magnetic field - an extremely effective plasma-based weapon.
item_plasma_rifle.tactical_text:
• Highly efficient and deadly primary weapon
  • Powerful plasma charge confers +1 bonus base damage on critical hits against biological enemies

item_plasma_sniper_rifle.name: Plasma Sniper Rifle
item_plasma_sniper_rifle.description: By modifying our current power system to hold a greater charge, we've developed a Plasma Sniper Rifle capable of delivering an extremely powerful shot that will greatly increase the odds of inflicting critical damage to hostile targets.
item_plasma_sniper_rifle.tactical_text:
• The deadliest sniper rifle XCOM can engineer
  • Unlike other weapons, Sniper Rifles are less accurate as the shooter's range to target decreases
  • Snipers cannot take costly actions (like moving) and fire in the same turn, unless trained appropriately
  • Plasma charge increases in power as it travels through our atmosphere and does +1 base damage on critical hits on targets who are positioned greater than 35 tiles from the soldier

item_plasma_stellerator.name: Plasma Stellerator
item_plasma_stellerator.description: Confers increased damage for our plasma weaponry.
item_plasma_stellerator.tactical_text: • Confers +1 damage for all plasma-tech and reflex primary weapons and rockets

item_plasma_stormgun.name: Plasma Stormgun
item_plasma_stormgun.description: An extremely lightweight plasma weapon that trades combat power for soldier mobility.
item_plasma_stormgun.tactical_text:
• Lightweight primary weapon
  • Confers +4 mobility, at a cost of damage and critical hit chances relative to rifles

item_proximity_mine_launcher.name: Proximity Mine Launcher
item_proximity_mine_launcher.description: Proximity mines can be deployed at medium range, and will await nearby enemy movement before triggering their explosive charges.
item_proximity_mine_launcher.tactical_text: • Proximity mines can be deployed at medium range, and will await nearby enemy movement before triggering their explosive charges. They do significantly more damage but have a smaller area of effect than grenade launchers.

item_psi_grenade.name: Psi Grenade
item_psi_grenade.description: By incorporating some meld into our standard flashbangs, we believe we have developed an enhanced version that our psionic troopers can employ to disorient our enemies over a much wider area of effect.
item_psi_grenade.tactical_text:
• Meld-enhanced, telekinetically-propelled flashbang that synergizes with psionic powers
  • Enemy units inside expanded blast radius suffer significant Aim and movement penalties during their next turn.
  • Robotic and advanced psionic enemies are immune
  • Shows up as Flashbang charge in ability icons; cannot carry these and flashbangs at the same time
  • Temporarily consumes a small amount of soldier's will to operate

item_psi_screen.name: Psi Screen
item_psi_screen.description: Psionic device that absorbs a measure of incoming damage to the soldier.
item_psi_screen.tactical_text: • Provides protection, but requires a measure of the user's willpower to maintain

item_pulse_autoblaster.name: Pulse Autoblaster
item_pulse_autoblaster.description: The Pulse Autoblaster forgoes precision in favor of emitting powerful blasts of laser energy at targets.
item_pulse_autoblaster.tactical_text: • A rapid-fire version of the Pulse Rifle that functions in Squad Automatic Weapon role

item_pulse_cannon.name: Pulse Cannon
item_pulse_cannon.description: A marked upgrade from the Laser Cannon, these supercooled weapons are unparalleled in their ability to quickly and precisely strike UFOs.
item_pulse_cannon.tactical_text: • All Laser Cannons are automatically upgraded to Pulse Cannons upon completion of the required foundry project

item_pulse_carbine.name: Pulse Carbine
item_pulse_carbine.description: A lightweight version of the pulse rifle.
item_pulse_carbine.tactical_text:
• Lightweight primary weapon
  • Less damage relative to its pulse rifle counterpart, but imparts +1 mobility and +6 accuracy

item_pulse_lance.name: Pulse Lance
item_pulse_lance.description: A pulse autolaser suitable for mounting on a MEC suit.

item_pulse_rifle.name: Pulse Rifle
item_pulse_rifle.description: In some ways a rapid-fire laser drill, the Pulse Rifle should provide a significant upgrade over our existing small arms.
item_pulse_rifle.tactical_text: • The Pulse Rifle emits a series of microsecond-duration blasts of light that destroy chemical bonds in targets

item_pulse_sniper_rifle.name: Pulse Sniper Rifle
item_pulse_sniper_rifle.description: This long-rifle variant of the Pulse Rifle is capable of hitting targets at significant range.
item_pulse_sniper_rifle.tactical_text:
• A long rifle version of the Pulse Rifle with an extremely high critical chance
  • Unlike other weapons, Sniper Rifles are less accurate the closer the shooter gets to the target
  • Sniper rifles have the best base chance to cause critical hits
  • Snipers cannot take costly actions (such as moving) and fire in the same turn without advanced training

item_pulse_stengun.name: Pulse Stengun
item_pulse_stengun.description: An extremely lightweight pulse weapon that trades combat power for soldier mobility.
item_pulse_stengun.tactical_text:
• Lightweight primary weapon
  • Confers +3 mobility, at a cost of damage and critical hit chances relative to rifles

item_railgun.name: Railgun
item_railgun.description: This high-powered, recoilless slugthrower can be fired in short bursts to devastating effect, although the sizes of its housing and power supply require it to be mounted on a MEC.
item_railgun.tactical_text:
• Miniaturized power supply derived from gauss tech
  • Gauss tech weapons have a 1 in 3 chance of nullifying a point of enemy damage reduction
  • Risk of catastrophic overheating precludes suppression with this weapon

item_reaper_pack.name: Reaper Pack
item_reaper_pack.description: Provides +16 critical chance but increases short-range aim penalties for sniper rifles and marksman's/strike rifles, and doubles long-range penalties for shotguns.
item_reaper_pack.tactical_text:
• Bulky supercapacitor unit for beam and pulse lasers that increases penetrative power
  • Doubles the weapon's range penalty (for shotguns, sniper and marksman's rifles)

item_recoilless_rifle.name: Recoilless Rifle
item_recoilless_rifle.description: The Recoilless Rifle uses our new electromagnetic technologies to propel heavier and deadlier explosive projectiles at targets than our conventional rocket launchers have allowed.
item_recoilless_rifle.tactical_text:
• Improved rocket launcher based on gauss weapon technology
  • Rockets fired by this weapon have a 1 in 3 chance of nullifying a point of enemy damage reduction
  • Destroys alien artifacts, preventing their recovery and exploitation
  • Friendly targets in the blast area are affected
  • During targeting, rocket scatter figure is expected (average) number of tiles rocket will be off-target by
  • Rocket has 68% chance to be at scatter distance or less from target and 95% chance of being twice scatter distance or less
  • Use Steady Weapon ability to increase accuracy for the next turn
  • Damage is reduced based on distance from point of detonation
  • Each rocket fired confers +1 mobility for the rest of the mission

item_reflex_cannon.name: Reflex Cannon
item_reflex_cannon.tactical_text:
• A hybrid of human and alien technologies, this weapon provides shotgun-like effects
  • Most effective at close range due to alloy spread
  • Has a high base chance to cause critical hits
  • Damage is maximized at point-blank range (4 tiles), with weapon conferring +1 base damage on critical hits

item_reflex_rifle.name: Reflex Rifle
item_reflex_rifle.description: A medium-range plasma rifle usable by our scouts and snipers.
item_reflex_rifle.tactical_text:
• Medium-range plasma rifle that functions in Marksman's Rifle role
  • Severe aim penalty when used at short range
  • Soldiers with Squadsight can target enemies and conduct reaction fire at up to five tiles beyond visual range
  • Ball plasma charge bursts near target, causing +1 bonus base damage on critical hits when target is flanked or out of cover

item_reinforced_armor.name: Reinforced Armor
item_reinforced_armor.description: Offers extra protection for a soldier, but inhibits agility.

item_respirator_implant.name: Respirator Implant
item_respirator_implant.description: We can fabricate a module that will automatically detect chemical and physical threats to a soldier's oxygen supply, and deploy uncomfortable but potentially life-saving oxygen tube shunts in a matter of seconds. This module will fit all of XCOM's armor designs and will transmit bleed-out timer data to Central.
item_respirator_implant.tactical_text:
• Causes soldiers to bleed out instead of dying the first time they go to zero health in a mission. The bleed-out timer is extended by 2 turns. (Critical wound will penalty is still assessed.)
  • Transmits bleed out timer to Central.

item_restorative_mist.name: Restorative Mist
item_restorative_mist.description: Medikits require fine motor control; instead, the MEC can spray Restorative Mist to heal all nearby allies.
item_restorative_mist.tactical_text:
• Medikits require fine motor control; instead, the MEC can spray Restorative Mist to heal all nearby allies.
  • Healing increased by +2 HP with the Improved Medikit Foundry project
  • Healing increased by +3 HP with the Savior perk

item_rocket.name: Rocket
item_rocket.description: This is a spare High Explosive rocket from our inventory. Be warned: It is bulky and will reduce a soldier's movement until fired.
item_rocket.tactical_text: • Allows rocketeer to carry one additional regular rocket

item_rocket_launcher.name: Rocket Launcher
item_rocket_launcher.description: A man-portable rocket launcher that can be fired for devastating effect on both enemies and terrain. Due to the extreme weight of its ammunition, can only be fired a limited number of times per mission.
item_rocket_launcher.tactical_text:
• Rockets do significant damage and have a large blast radius
  • Destroys alien artifacts, preventing their recovery and exploitation
  • Friendly targets in the blast area are affected
  • During targeting, rocket scatter figure is expected (average) number of tiles rocket will be off-target by
  • Rocket has 68% chance to be at scatter distance or less from target and 95% chance of being twice scatter distance or less
  • Use Steady Weapon ability to increase accuracy for the next turn
  • Damage is reduced based on distance from point of detonation
  • Each rocket fired confers +1 mobility for the rest of the mission

item_satellite.name: Satellite
item_satellite.description: An advanced reconnaissance satellite modified to detect the unique gravitational distortions caused by alien craft in flight.
item_satellite.tactical_text:
• Satellites provide coverage of allied nations, helping XCOM spot UFOs before they land
  • The number of satellites XCOM can field depends on how many Satellite Uplinks and Satellite Nexuses are built
  • Launching a satellite reduces panic by 10 in the target country
  • A satellite being destroyed increases panic by 25 in the covered country, and by 5 in the rest of the continent
  • Having a satellite on the same continent as a country caps the country's defection chance due to panic to 90%
  • Having a satellite over a country caps the country's defection chance due to panic to 50%
  • Once per month, satellites have a 50% chance of reducing panic by 5 if the covered country has panic >= 95
  • Once per month, satellites have a 10% chance of reducing panic by 5 if the covered country has panic >= 80

item_saw.name: SAW
item_saw.description: The ballistic Squad Automatic Weapon, with its increased ammo capacity relative to an assault rifle, provides a balance between mobility and firepower.
item_saw.tactical_text: • Automatic Rifle designed to serve in squad automatic weapon role

item_sawed_off_shotgun.name: Sawed-off Shotgun
item_sawed_off_shotgun.description: A truncated combat shotgun, suitable for carrying in place of a pistol.
item_sawed_off_shotgun.tactical_text:
• Street modification of one of our combat ballistic shotguns
  • May be carried in pistol slot, but confers -1 mobility
  • High-damage weapon that injures targets only at extremely short range, as rapid pellet spread renders it ineffective at longer ranges
  • Holds only one shot, and ammo capacity enhancements do not improve this

item_scatter_blaster.name: Scatter Blaster
item_scatter_blaster.description: A shotgun-equivalent weapon employing pulse laser technology.
item_scatter_blaster.tactical_text:
• An application of pulse laser technology to provide shotgun-like effects
  • Most effective at close range due to beam diffusion

item_scatter_laser.name: Scatter Laser
item_scatter_laser.description: The Scatter Laser is capable of inflicting considerable damage; however, accuracy suffers greatly as the range to target increases. In addition, it is not as effective against hardened targets or those in cover.
item_scatter_laser.tactical_text:
• An application of laser technology to provide shotgun-like effects
  • Most effective at close range due to beam diffusion

item_scope.name: SCOPE
item_scope.description: When equipped, this advanced targeting module integrates with XCOM's Active HUD system to offer a significant increase to our soldiers' aim.

item_sectoid_captive.name: Sectoid Captive
item_sectoid_captive.description: While most gray market buyers cannot hold a live alien, researchers are willing to offer funding to come to our facilities to perform a vivisection.

item_sectoid_commander_captive.name: Sectoid Commander Captive
item_sectoid_commander_captive.description: While most gray market buyers cannot hold a live alien, researchers are willing to offer funding to come to our facilities to perform a vivisection.

item_sectoid_commander_corpse.name: Sectoid Commander Corpse
item_sectoid_commander_corpse.description: Much like the standard Sectoid variant, the Sectoid Commander corpse has a distinctive chemical smell that only gets worse over time.

item_sectoid_corpse.name: Sectoid Corpse
item_sectoid_corpse.description: Sectoid cadavers exhibit very little decomposition, though after a while they begin to give off an unpleasant chemical odor.

item_sectopod_corpse.name: Sectopod Wreck
item_sectopod_corpse.description: This contorted husk of metal and electronic circuitry was quite dangerous in its original form.

item_seeker_corpse.name: Seeker Wreck
item_seeker_corpse.description: The Seeker's wreck retains charge, causing the tentacles to twitch unexpectedly well beyond the point of nonfunctionality.

item_sentry_gun.name: Sentry Gun
item_sentry_gun.description: The four-barrelled SHIV Sentry Gun is an upgraded Minigun incorporating gauss technologies to provide a higher rate of fire and increased muzzle velocity.
item_sentry_gun.tactical_text:
• Heavy machine gun employing Gauss technologies
  • Gauss tech weapons have a 1 in 3 chance of nullifying a point of enemy damage reduction

item_seraph_armor.name: Seraph Armor
item_seraph_armor.description: Seraph Armor incorporates the same jet pack as Archangel Armor, but it trades protection in favor of mobility.
item_seraph_armor.tactical_text:
• Toggle flight mode to initiate flying movement
  • Taking off, and each turn in flight, costs 1 fuel unit
  • The armor carries 6 fuel units; this can be expanded with additional experimental research

item_shadow_armor.name: Shadow Armor
item_shadow_armor.description: By integrating a stealth field based on the phase-shifts observed in the hyperwave beacon, this suit makes it extremely difficult for the wearer to be detected in the field. It should be noted, the stealth system is only effective when used by a soldier in cover.
item_shadow_armor.tactical_text:
• Stealth systems allow wearer to become invisible
  • Ghost mode can be activated up to 3 times per battle
  • Activating Ghost Mode does not cost an action, nor end the soldier's turn

item_shadow_device.name: Shadow Device
item_shadow_device.description: This psionic device contains elerium-infused particles that, when diffused onto our soldiers, causes them to become invisible. The particles will lose their elerium charge after a brief time, and competing energy sources - such as weapons fire - will disrupt them.
item_shadow_device.tactical_text:
• Confers temporary stealth on all friendly units in blast radius
  • Stealth lasts until the start of the unit's next turn
  • Attacks from stealth receive a substantial bonus to critical chance
  • Does not affect panicking units, Seekers or units with Concealment
  • Psionic strain of use only allows equipping one of these items, and it does not gain charge bonuses from perks

item_shiv.name: SHIV
item_shiv.description: The Super Heavy Infantry Vehicle, or SHIV, is an advanced weapons platform that can be deployed in place of a human soldier. While extremely capable in most combat scenarios, any damage to the SHIV will require lengthy repairs.
item_shiv.tactical_text:
• Autonomous mini-tank
  • Weapon loadout can be upgraded depending on what weapons technology has been researched
  • Combat logic circuits can enable suppression and other abilities if proper Foundry research is done
  • SHIVs need extra time to load onto the Skyranger during combat; if aborting a mission, do NOT take any action with the SHIV after moving into the extraction zone

item_shotgun.name: Shotgun
item_shotgun.description: A close-range solution for close-range problems, the ballistic shotgun is extremely effective against soft targets, though it has difficulty with armored or well-covered enemies.
item_shotgun.tactical_text: • The shotgun has a high base critical chance, but extremely limited range

item_shredder_ammo.name: Shredder Ammo
item_shredder_ammo.description: Special ammo that briefly leaves target susceptible to increased damage from additional hits.
item_shredder_ammo.tactical_text: • Using your primary weapon to hit an enemy when equipped with this ammo confers the 'shredded' effect for one turn, meaning the enemy takes extra damage from additional hits

item_shredder_rocket.name: Shredder Rocket
item_shredder_rocket.description: The Shredder Rocket both damages a target and leaves it vulnerable to increased damage from additional hits for several rounds. Be warned: This item is bulky and will reduce a soldier's movement when carried.
item_shredder_rocket.tactical_text: • Allows rocketeer to carry a shredder rocket (and stacks with Shredder Rocket perk)

item_skeleton_key.name: Skeleton Key
item_skeleton_key.description: This device is the culmination of our research into the shard recovered from the alien Outsider. It should allow our troops to infiltrate an alien base and find out what's inside.
item_skeleton_key.tactical_text:
• Used to disable the Alien Base's defenses, enabling a raid by XCOM forces
  • Not equipped by soldiers; having it in XCOM HQ will suffice
  • Consumed after one use; we'll need more to assault additional bases

item_smartshell_pod.name: Smartshell Pod
item_smartshell_pod.description: The SHIV SmartShell Pod allows the firing of accurate, low-damage bursting rounds that force targets to change their location.
item_smartshell_pod.tactical_text: • Confers Flush perk, allowing SHIV to force enemies to break cover

item_smg.name: SMG
item_smg.description: The ballistic submachine gun doesn't have the firepower of the assault rifle or its larger variants, but it makes up for it in letting soldiers cover a lot of ground quickly.
item_smg.tactical_text:
• Lightweight primary weapon
  • Confers +3 mobility, at a cost of damage and critical hit chances relative to rifles

item_smoke_grenade.name: Smoke Grenade
item_smoke_grenade.description: A popular utility device for keeping soldiers safe during conventional warfare on Earth, we have found the alien threat to be equally stymied by the smoke cloud produced by this grenade.
item_smoke_grenade.tactical_text:
• Confers +20 defense bonus to all units within smoke cloud
  • Smoke cloud lasts for 2 turns
  • Units at the edge of the effect radius may not be affected
  • Units in smoke do not suffer an increased chance to be critically hit due to being exposed or flanked
  • Support grenade
  • Smoke deploys in this tile pattern:

item_sniper_rifle.name: Sniper Rifle
item_sniper_rifle.description: A ballistic rifle designed for precision marksmanship at long range. Extremely unwieldy in close combat, but excellent for disabling or killing enemies from a safe distance.
item_sniper_rifle.tactical_text:
• A long rifle version of the Assault Rifle
