  • Unlike other weapons, Sniper Rifles are less accurate as the shooter's range to target decreases
  • Snipers cannot use any costly actions (like moving) and fire in the same turn, unless trained appropriately

item_stingray_missiles.name: Stingray Missiles
item_stingray_missiles.description: Stingray Missiles are small, fast air-to-air missiles. They have traded some explosive punch for a shaped warhead that can penetrate airborne hard targets.
item_stingray_missiles.tactical_text: • Small guided missiles that don't do as much damage as an Avalanche, but is shaped to penetrate armored airborne targets

item_superheavy_laser.name: Superheavy Laser
item_superheavy_laser.description: The Superheavy Laser is an adaptation of our infantry Autolaser for deployment on a SHIV platform.

item_superheavy_plasma.name: Superheavy Plasma
item_superheavy_plasma.description: The Superheavy Plasma is the ultimate in close-combat plasma weaponry. The field generator, power supply and cooling system require a SHIV chassis for support.

item_superheavy_pulser.name: Superheavy Pulser
item_superheavy_pulser.description: The brutal Superheavy Pulser is a more powerful version of the infantry Pulse Autolaser. Its large power supply and radiators require it be mounted on a SHIV platform.
item_superheavy_pulser.tactical_text: • Powerful SHIV weapon with bonus critical hit chance

item_tac_armor.name: Tac Armor
item_tac_armor.description: A simple tactical armor designed for use against conventional weaponry. It is unlikely to stand up well against the advanced technology we have witnessed from the aliens thus far.
item_tac_armor.tactical_text:
• Light armor
  • XCOM soldiers will appreciate it if better armor development is given a high priority

item_tac_vest.name: Tac Vest
item_tac_vest.description: Even more lightly armored than the Tac Armor, this vest is best used by soldiers who need to move quickly and aren't likely to get shot at.

item_tactical_sensors.name: Tactical Sensors
item_tactical_sensors.description: This sensor and computer package will assist our MECs during heavy combat.
item_tactical_sensors.tactical_text: • Confers Tactical Sense perk, granting +5 defense for each enemy in view, up to a maximum of +20

item_targeting_module.name: Targeting Module
item_targeting_module.description: Based on our preliminary understanding of alien physiology, we can construct a weapon addon that helps the soldier target critical points on our enemies, providing bonus critical chance and damage for all our units.
item_targeting_module.tactical_text: • Confers +8 critical chance and +1 base damage when calculating critical hits

item_the_thumper.name: The Thumper
item_the_thumper.description: This device will increase the damage done by MEC Kinetic Strike Modules.
item_the_thumper.tactical_text:
• Confers +3 damage for Kinetic Strike Module
  • Dr. Vahlen has expressed preference this device be referred to by its formal designation, the KSM-EC-7

item_thin_man_captive.name: Thin Man Captive
item_thin_man_captive.description: While most gray market buyers cannot hold a live alien, researchers are willing to offer funding to come to our facilities to perform a vivisection.

item_thin_man_corpse.name: Thin Man Corpse
item_thin_man_corpse.description: The Thin Man cadaver begins to severely decompose within hours after death, giving off an overwhelming stench which may relate to toxins stored within its body.

item_titan_armor.name: Titan Armor
item_titan_armor.description: The Titan Armor is among our heaviest designs, enhancing our soldier's protection from weapons fire, while also providing immunity to fire and toxins.

item_ufo_flight_computer.name: UFO Flight Computer
item_ufo_flight_computer.description: This system appears to be primarily focused on navigation and celestial mapping, while also providing high-speed collision avoidance during flight.
item_ufo_flight_computer.tactical_text:
• Obtained from crashed or landed UFOs
  • Has a 75% chance to be damaged in a UFO shot down with conventional weaponry
  • 20% less likely to be damaged in a UFO shot down with an EMP Cannon

item_ufo_flight_computer_damaged.name: UFO Flight Computer (damaged)
item_ufo_flight_computer_damaged.description: <font color='#32CD32'>This item has no research benefit, and can be sold freely.</font> Although the alien navigational systems are highly advanced, this equipment has taken too much damage for us to study.
item_ufo_flight_computer_damaged.tactical_text:
• Obtained from crashed or landed UFOs
  • Has a 75% chance to be damaged in a UFO shot down with conventional weaponry
  • 20% less likely to be damaged in a UFO shot down with an EMP Cannon

item_ufo_power_source.name: UFO Power Source
item_ufo_power_source.description: This power cell is apparently capable of generating enough energy to power the alien craft and its requisite systems. The Elerium core must be the key to its amazing efficiency.
item_ufo_power_source.tactical_text:
• Obtained from raids on alien bases and crashed or landed UFOs
  • Has a 80% chance to be damaged in a UFO shot down with conventional weaponry
  • 20% less likely to be damaged in a UFO shot down with an EMP Cannon

item_ufo_power_source_damaged.name: UFO Power Source (damaged)
item_ufo_power_source_damaged.description: <font color='#32CD32'>This item has no research benefit, and can be sold freely.</font> Researching the alien power source is crucial to our own advances, but this particular example is too far gone to be of any use.
item_ufo_power_source_damaged.tactical_text:
• Obtained from raids on alien bases and crashed or landed UFOs
  • Has a 80% chance to be damaged in a UFO shot down with conventional weaponry
  • 20% less likely to be damaged in a UFO shot down with an EMP Cannon

item_ufo_tracking_boost.name: UFO Tracking (Boost)
item_ufo_tracking_boost.description: Activate this module during interception to provide an immediate, temporary boost to our unit's pursuit speed. The module will burn out after one use. Its technology lets us focus our satellites' computation resources on UFO pursuit, and might buy precious time to chase down even the fastest UFOs.

item_uplink_targeting_aim.name: Uplink Targeting (Aim)
item_uplink_targeting_aim.description: Activate this module during interception to provide an immediate, temporary boost to the accuracy of our aircraft's primary weapon. The module will burn out after correcting two misses with our primary weapon into hits, but it will be unavailable if our fighter is in a defensive posture.

item_vortex_armor.name: Vortex Armor
item_vortex_armor.description: Our most powerful armored suit, this equipment serves to amplify the wearer's psionic abilities through a system modeled after the alien's own cybernetic implants. However, it should be noted, this armor can only be equipped by a soldier found to have Psionic abilities.
item_vortex_armor.tactical_text:
• Heavy armor
  • Prevents soldier from being fatigued
  • A soldier with this armor and the Mind Control perk is necessary to activate the Gollop Chamber

item_walker_servos.name: Walker Servos
item_walker_servos.description: Exoskeletal armor addon that confers increased burst of speed or carrying capacity for our soldiers.

item_weapon_fragment.name: Weapon Fragment
item_weapon_fragment.description: Based on our experience in the field, it seems the alien weaponry is designed to self-destruct when the operator dies. These fragments are all that we've managed to recover from the remains.

item_weapon_supercooler.name: Weapon Supercooler
item_weapon_supercooler.description: Barrel Supercooler technology will allow our SHIV weapons to sustain a high rate of fire.
item_weapon_supercooler.tactical_text: • Confers Light 'Em Up perk, allowing SHIV to take a fire action and second action during its turn
